reviewText: I am so aggravated that so many of my Brit coms do not come in region 1 USA format, especially first and last of the Summer Wine series 1 and 2 First of the Summer Wine series 1 and 2, Oh Doctor Beeching the complete series and All 3 of the on the Buses Movies and why cant they digitally remaster all f the series they have out? All of these series I would have purchased tonight 2/15/2017 if they had been available. someone at amazon please contact the BBC and tell them to get with it
